sub_title: MA Museum and Heritage Studies | BA Fine Art and History of Art | Looking to become an archivist or art registrar and work daily with modern and contemporary art.
summary: From my BA in History of Art and Fine Art to the recent MA in Museum Studies (Heritage Studies), interweaving art theory and practice has always been key to me. Thinking critically about artworks, exhibitions, and new museological practices drive my thoughts every day a step further.
